data.message: Thank you Facebook for this amazing acknowledgement and raising awareness of International Day of Peace! LOVE the love bursts. So much love and peace today and every day :) Peacehug

replies.message: Thank you for spreading the message of peace every day! Today we’re celebrating with our community by encouraging others to spread love. We’re happy to have you join us in the celebration. Happy International Day of Peace! <3 -Kate

Facebook Hey ! Why is your customer support become so bad these days, i have been trying to report an issue from the last 9 days and there is no one getting back to me from your team. Please do contact me this is urgent.
The Love button should continue to burst! Thanks!
Happy International Day of Peace, Love and Unity.Thank you Face Book.😍❤️💕😍

Facebook Hello sir  I recently on 7th september 2016 last week merged the pages..Why did my page likes not combine when I merged pages? I had two Facebook Pages of the same name (Kuwait PAGE ) i merged the page which was with more likes 268,963 after merging the page to the new page the old page disappeared the likes of the old page did not combine to the new page . I have spend money more than $7,302.45 . Can you please help has i complain to facebook i received a feedback saying ( We received your report and appreciate your patience as we work to fix technical problems on Facebook. Though we can't update everyone who submits a report, we're using your feedback to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. To contact us about non-technical issues, please visit the Help Center ) more than 5 times i complained same feedback.. Please can you help Kuwait-PAGE OLD Facebook Page ID /137070539807145 NEW Facebook Page ID / 143321582513253 I have sent you a pic attachment of OLD Kuwait-PAGE ID /137070539807145 which i merged to NEW Facebook Page ID / 143321582513253 Old page ( Likes ) did not combine to the new page . I have spend money more than $7,302.45
💞 International Day of Peace so much loved n peace 💞💕🎁🌸🌼✌💕💖
